languages.text: "Господин называет меня предсказателем и творцом, а остальные — страшным {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}колдуном{/g}. Опасения напрасны: я санкционирован и чист перед небесным оком Императора". {n}В подтверждение этих слов скульптор указывает на трубки, идущие из его затылка.{/n}

"My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator — others, a wicked {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcerer{/g}. But there is no cause for concern: my abilities are sanctioned, and I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head, as if to prove the truth of his words.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Господин называет меня предсказателем и творцом, а остальные — страшным {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}колдуном{/g}. Опасения напрасны: я санкционирован и чист перед небесным оком Императора". {n}В подтверждение этих слов скульптор указывает на трубки, идущие из его затылка.{/n}

"My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator, others, a sorcerer. And yet, my abilities are sanctioned. I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head as if to prove his words.{/n}

"My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator — others, a wicked {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcerer{/g}. But there is no cause for concern: my abilities are sanctioned, and I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head, as if to prove the truth of his words.{/n}

languages.text: “总督大人称呼我为预言家、创造者，而其他人称我为邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}巫师{/g}。不过，无须担心，我的能力已经得到了帝国授权。在帝皇的全知之眼中，我是纯洁的子民。”{n}他朝后脑勺的管子做了个手势，仿佛要证明自己说的都是真话一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator — others, a wicked {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcerer{/g}. But there is no cause for concern: my abilities are sanctioned, and I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head, as if to prove the truth of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “总督大人称呼我为预言家、创造者，而其他人称我为邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}巫师{/g}。不过，无须担心，我的能力已经得到了帝国授权。在帝皇的全知之眼中，我是纯洁的子民。”{n}他朝后脑勺的管子做了个手势，仿佛要证明自己说的都是真话一样。{/n}

languages.text: «Mi señor el gobernador me llama adivino y creador; otros me consideran un vil {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}hechicero{/g}. Pero no tiene de qué preocuparse: mis aptitudes están sancionadas por el Imperium y soy puro a los celestiales ojos del Emperador». {n}Como para demostrar sus palabras, señala con un gesto los tubos que sobresalen de su nuca.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator — others, a wicked {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcerer{/g}. But there is no cause for concern: my abilities are sanctioned, and I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head, as if to prove the truth of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi señor el gobernador me llama adivino y creador; otros me consideran un vil {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}hechicero{/g}. Pero no tiene de qué preocuparse: mis aptitudes están sancionadas por el Imperium y soy puro a los celestiales ojos del Emperador». {n}Como para demostrar sus palabras, señala con un gesto los tubos que sobresalen de su nuca.{/n}

languages.text: "Vali efendim bana kâhin ve yaratıcı der, diğerleriyse kötü bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sahir{/g}. Yine de endişelenecek bir şey yok, yeteneklerim onaylıdır. İmparator'un semavi gözünün önünde safım." {n}Sözlerinin doğruluğunu kanıtlamak ister gibi başının arkasındaki tüpleri işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator — others, a wicked {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcerer{/g}. But there is no cause for concern: my abilities are sanctioned, and I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head, as if to prove the truth of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vali efendim bana kâhin ve yaratıcı der, diğerleriyse kötü bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sahir{/g}. Yine de endişelenecek bir şey yok, yeteneklerim onaylıdır. İmparator'un semavi gözünün önünde safım." {n}Sözlerinin doğruluğunu kanıtlamak ister gibi başının arkasındaki tüpleri işaret ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「主人である総督はわしのことを予言者とか、創作家と呼び、他の者は邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}ソーサラー{/g}と呼びます。しかし、心配には及びません。わしの能力は制限されており、わしは皇帝の天の目の前では清らかなのです」{n}彼は自身の言葉の真実を証明するかのように、頭の後ろにあるチューブを身振りで示す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator — others, a wicked {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcerer{/g}. But there is no cause for concern: my abilities are sanctioned, and I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head, as if to prove the truth of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「主人である総督はわしのことを予言者とか、創作家と呼び、他の者は邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}ソーサラー{/g}と呼びます。しかし、心配には及びません。わしの能力は制限されており、わしは皇帝の天の目の前では清らかなのです」{n}彼は自身の言葉の真実を証明するかのように、頭の後ろにあるチューブを身振りで示す。{/n}

languages.text: « Mon seigneur gouverneur dit de moi que je suis un devin et un créateur. D'autres que je suis un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcier{/g} malveillant. Mais nulle raison de vous inquiéter. Je suis assermenté et immaculé devant l'œil céleste de l'Empereur. » {n}Comme pour appuyer ses mots, il désigne d'un geste les tubes à l'arrière de sa tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator — others, a wicked {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcerer{/g}. But there is no cause for concern: my abilities are sanctioned, and I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head, as if to prove the truth of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mon seigneur gouverneur dit de moi que je suis un devin et un créateur. D'autres que je suis un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcier{/g} malveillant. Mais nulle raison de vous inquiéter. Je suis assermenté et immaculé devant l'œil céleste de l'Empereur. » {n}Comme pour appuyer ses mots, il désigne d'un geste les tubes à l'arrière de sa tête.{/n}

languages.text: "Mein Gouverneur nennt mich einen Wahrsager und Schöpfer, andere einen {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}Hexer{/g}. Aber es gibt keinen Grund zur Sorge. Meine Fähigkeiten sind sanktioniert und ich bin vor dem himmlischen Auge des Imperators rein." {n}Er deutet auf die Röhren an seinem Hinterkopf, als wolle er den Wahrheitsgehalt seine Worte beweisen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My lord governor calls me a foreteller and creator — others, a wicked {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorcerer{/g}. But there is no cause for concern: my abilities are sanctioned, and I am pure before the Emperor's celestial eye." {n}He gestures at the tubes on the back of his head, as if to prove the truth of his words.{/n}
